com.siperian.sif.message.metadata

Class MetaDataMatchRule

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.siperian.sif.message.metadata.MetaDataBase
      • com.siperian.sif.message.metadata.MetaDataMatchRule
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Serializable, Comparable

    public class MetaDataMatchRule
extends MetaDataBase
    Represents properties of a match rule in the Siperian Hub.
    See Also:
    DescribeSiperianObjectRequest, MetaDataMatchRuleSet, Serialized Form

    API Group: Metadata

    • Constructor Detail

      • MetaDataMatchRule

        public MetaDataMatchRule()

    • Method Detail

      • setAutoMerge

        public void setAutoMerge(boolean autoMerge)
        Used by the Hub Server to construct the response. Set whether this is an automerge rule
        Parameters:
        autoMerge - Whether this is an automerge rule

      • isAutoMerge

        public boolean isAutoMerge()
        Get whether this is an automerge rule. Automerge rules create matches that are automatically merged.
        Returns:
        true if this is an automerge rule, false otherwise.

      • setExactMatch

        public void setExactMatch(boolean exactMatch)
        Used by the Hub Server to construct the response. Set whether this is an exact match rule
        Parameters:
        exactMatch - Whether this is an exact match rule

      • isExactMatch

        public boolean isExactMatch()
        Get whether this is an exact match rule. Exact match rules match based on the values in one record matching to values in another record exactly.
        Returns:
        true if this is an exact match rule, false otherwise.

      • setExactRuleUidMatchPackage

        public void setExactRuleUidMatchPackage(String uid)
        Used by the Hub Server to construct the response. Set the UID of the match package for the exact rule.
        Parameters:
        uid - The UID of the match package for the exact rule.

      • getExactRuleUidMatchPackage

        public String getExactRuleUidMatchPackage()
        Get the UID of the Hub package that is used to examine records for the exact rule.
        Returns:
        The UID of the match package for the exact rule.

      • setMatchForTableUid

        public void setMatchForTableUid(String uid)
        Used by the Hub Server to construct the response. Set the UID of the match table.
        Parameters:
        uid - The UID of the match table.

      • getMatchForTableUid

        public String getMatchForTableUid()
        Get the UID of the match table for this match rule. The match table is the <base object>_MTCH table used to store match results.
        Returns:
        The UID of the match table for this match rule.

      • setMatchLevel

        public void setMatchLevel(String matchLevel)
        Used by the Hub Server to construct the response. Set the match level.
        Parameters:
        matchLevel - The match level.

      • getMatchLevel

        public String getMatchLevel()
        Get the match level for this match rule. The match level is used to determine how similar two records have to be to be considered a match.
        Returns:
        The match level for this match rule.

      • setMatchPurpose

        public void setMatchPurpose(String matchPurpose)
        Used by the Hub Server to construct the response. Set the match purpose.
        Parameters:
        matchPurpose - The match purpose.

      • getMatchPurpose

        public String getMatchPurpose()
        Get the match purpose for this match rule. This is description of the match rule.
        Returns:
        The match purpose for this match rule.

      • setMatchRuleSetUid

        public void setMatchRuleSetUid(String uid)
        Used by the Hub Server to construct the response. Set the UID of the match rule.
        Parameters:
        uid - The UID of the match rule.

      • getMatchRuleSetUid

        public String getMatchRuleSetUid()
        Get the UID of the match rule
        Returns:
        The UID of the match rule.

      • setRuleNumber

        public void setRuleNumber(int ruleNumber)
        Used by the Hub Server to construct the response. Set the rule number.
        Parameters:
        ruleNumber - The rule number.

      • getRuleNumber

        public int getRuleNumber()
        Get the rule number for this match rule. This represents where in the containing match rule set this rule appears. It is also associated with match results so that match results can be tied back to the match rule that created the match result.
        Returns:
        The rule number for this match rule.

      • getMatchColumnUids

        public ArrayList getMatchColumnUids()
        Get an ArrayList of the UIDs for the match columns in this match rule. These can be used with the DescribeSiperianObjectRequest to get the MetaDataMatchColumn objects for the match columns of this match rule.
        Returns:
        Returns the UIDs of the match columns for this match rule.

      • setMatchColumnUids

        public void setMatchColumnUids(ArrayList matchColumnUids)
        Used by the Hub Server to construct the response.
        Parameters:
        matchColumnUids - The matchColumns to set.

      • addMatchColumn

        public void addMatchColumn(String uid)
        Used by the Hub Server to construct the response. Add a match column to the list of match columns for this rule.
        Parameters:
        uid - The match column to add.

        Override the compare method to compare by sequence.
